resources.string: Do you want to continue or start a new game?
Adrián Portela Ortiz\nJosé Carlos Sánchez Pérez
Now you can travel to Sarajevo.
You do not acquired the ticket. Try again?
Are you sure do you want to quit the game?
You do not have enough money to choose this transport
YOU PAY 100€ TO BUY A FAKE ONE
You do not have a passport
The Third World War has taken place in Europe. You have to flee in order to save your life. Hurry up! Try to be wise!
The enemies are about to arrive. What will you take with you?
Very good. Now it is time to leave. Do you want to pay for a means of transport or steal a car?
You have spent 300 €, but you can travel by lorry.
Oh, no! There is too much weight! What do you want to get rid of?
You are hungry and thirsty. You have to spend 100€
You are freezing. It is very cold. You have to spend 100€ to be warm.
Good! They are not really necessary.
Congratulations! You can continue the journey.
Oh no, you have a flat tire! What do you want to do?
Do you want to continue on foot or do you prefer to wait till someone shows up?
You have met some people on the way. Do you want to talk with them?
After a few days, you have met some people on the way and this time you decide to go with them, but do you have your passport?
They want to help you but they do not trust in people without passport. Do you have your passport?
Congratulations! You can continue the journey.
Some people stop to help you.
You have to spend 100€ to buy a fake one. Congratulations! You can continue the journey.
You have managed to escape and you can continue on your way to Istanbul.
You have not been able to flee. You will have to try again.
It is time to rest. Where do you wantt to stay?
Which one do you think it\'s your room?
Sorry! it isn\'t your room, but now you know more about Chinese people form other cultures. Try again!
Sorry! it isn\'t your room, but now you know more about Mexican people form other cultures. Try again!
Sorry! it isn\'t your room, but now you know more about African people form other cultures. Try again!
Finally, you\'have found your room! What a hard day, huh!
Luís M. Barquillo Romero\nMiguel del Puerto Melchor
Select the song you wanna play
Which place you wanna play at?
Raúl Fernandez del Cerro\nRoberto Calvo García
Finally you have arrived in a country where you think you can live.
You have to look for a job to make a living. You need to check some ads.
Select the job offer you prefer
The day of the interview you have to choose your clothes. Which one would you choose?
The recruiter asks you in the interview…
Have you worked before in this country?
How well do you speak the language? Will you understand instructions?
Why do you think I should choose you?
What kind of degrees do you have?
I used to be a teacher
I used to work as an accountant
Have you been trained for this job before?
You have taken an object that you should not have, or you have let an object pass that you should catch
